Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring that the department of investigation conduct public outreach campaigns and issue yearly reports on complaints received
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that DOI conduct public outreach campaigns and issue yearly annual reports on complaints received.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to completion by the department of investigation of city vendor name checks
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring DOI to complete vendor name checks for city vendors 30 days prior to the commencement of a contract.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring that the department of investigation conduct public outreach campaigns and issue yearly reports on complaints received
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring that DOI conduct public outreach campaigns and issue yearly annual reports on complaints received.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring that the department of investigation conduct public outreach campaigns and issue yearly reports on complaints received
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that DOI conduct public outreach campaigns and issue yearly annual reports on complaints received.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring that the department of investigation conduct public outreach campaigns and issue yearly reports on complaints received
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Requiring that DOI conduct public outreach campaigns and issue yearly annual reports on complaints received.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
